Hello and thanks for checking out my site. My name is Shaun Fox and I’m a designer/student living in Austin, TX with my beautiful wife and daughter. I am currently completing a BFA in Communication Design at Texas State University. I love typography, reading, logo design, playing the guitar, design for social causes, organic gardening, and I am most recently into binding little books for myself and my friends.

Don’t be shy, Say Hello!
